titleStmt.title: The excellency of publick charity a sermon preach'd before the University of Oxford in New-College-Chappel, on the Feast of the Annuntiation, 1697 / by H. Downes.
titleStmt.author: Downes, Henry, 1667-1735.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
